binding:binding.name: Edimax SmartPlug Binding
binding:binding.description: This is the binding for Edimax SmartPlug based on the OH1 plugin from derHeinz. At the moment there are two devices supported. The Smartplug SP-1101W and the Smartplug with metering SP-2101W.
binding:binding.author: Falk Harnisch, derHeinz
